mapper.select: SELECT S.MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , MEM_GENDER , MEM_TELL , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_IMAGE , MEM_ADDR||MEM_ADDR_DETAIL AS MEM_ADDR , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS MEM_BIRTH , STU_NO , (SELECT TO_CHAR(STU_YEAR)||'학년'||' '||TO_CHAR(STU_SEM)||'학기'FROM STU WHERE STU_NO = #{memNo})AS STU_YEAR , STU_STATUS , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_NO = S.DEPT_NO)||' '||(SELECT COLL_NAME FROM COLLEAGE WHERE COLL_NO = S.COLL_NO)AS COLL_NO , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_NO = (SELECT DOUBLE_DEPT FROM DOUBLE_MAJOR WHERE STU_NO = #{memNo})) AS DOUBLE_NO FROM MEMBER M , STU S WHERE M.MEM_NO = #{memNo} AND S.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO
